revision.comment: Omega moved page [[Westell A90-9100EM15-10]] to [[Westell VersaLink 9100 (A90-9100EM15-10)]]: fixed ;
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Westell |model=Versalink |revision=9100 (A90-9100EM15-10) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/09/2007 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Askey |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=FiOS modem, wireless router |fcc_id=CH89100VMXX-10,CH8MXX50,H8N-WLL3090 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Infineon |cpu1_model=PXB 4000;XWAY TwinPass-E (PXB 4000 E); |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL128P90TFCR2 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4H511638D-UCB3 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Askey WLL3090 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2413 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6065 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=XXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^[A-F0-9]{5}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:24:D2 |oui_eth=00:23:97 }} '''Verizon Westell 9100'''
"3052-009680" is silkscreened on the main board. ''Askey'' is the presumed manufacturer. :A typical ''Askey'' MAC label (same font / format) is also affixed to the board. :"3017-000660" is silkscreened on the wireless module. :It is presumed to be an [[Askey WLL3090]]. There are two [[Marvell]] 88E6065 Switch chips on the board. :The device uses two ''Entropic Communications'' EN2210 :for the coaxial ([http://www.mocalliance.org/ MoCA]) connections.
CPU: [[Infineon]] ([[Lantiq]]) XWAYâ„¢ TwinPass-E (PXB 4000 E)
*[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=56219 On the DD-WRT forums] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=27106 On the OpenWrt forums] :Terrible quality pictures are available [http://s1018.photobucket.com/albums/af308/rtoledo2002/Westel_9100_internals/ here].
